table-entry.name: Clamping
table-entry.col-data: ID INTEGER NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1), NAME VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, relativePosition INTEGER NOT NULL, smoothToPoint INTEGER NOT NULL, smoothFromPoint INTEGER NOT NULL, HEIGHT DOUBLE NOT NULL, defaultHeight DOUBLE NOT NULL, imageUrl VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, Type INTEGER NOT NULL, Clampingtype INTEGER NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT PKEY_Clamping PRIMARY KEY (ID)

table-entry.name: Program
table-entry.col-data: ID INTEGER NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1), NAME VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, CREATION TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, LASTOPENED TIMESTAMP, unloadstacker INTEGER NOT NULL, loadCNC INTEGER NOT NULL, unloadCNC INTEGER NOT NULL, loadstacker INTEGER NOT NULL, Clamping INTEGER NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT PKEY_PROGRAM PRIMARY KEY (ID), CONSTRAINT STEP_Clamping FOREIGN KEY (Clamping)REFERENCES Clamping(ID)

table-entry.name: Coordinates
table-entry.col-data: ID INTEGER NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1), X DOUBLE DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL, Y DOUBLE DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL, Z DOUBLE DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL, W DOUBLE DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL, P DOUBLE DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL, R DOUBLE DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT PKEY_COORDINATES PRIMARY KEY (ID)

table-entry.name: Gripper
table-entry.col-data: ID INTEGER NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1), NAME VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, HEIGHT DOUBLE NOT NULL, fixedHeight BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL, selectGripper VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, gripperInner BOOLEAN NOT NULL, imageUrl VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, Type INTEGER NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT PKEY_Gripper PRIMARY KEY (ID)

table-entry.name: RobotPutSetting
table-entry.col-data: ID INTEGER NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1), releaseBeforeMachine BOOLEAN NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT PKEY_RobotPutSetting PRIMARY KEY (ID)

table-entry.name: Smooth
table-entry.col-data: ID INTEGER NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1), X DOUBLE NOT NULL, Y DOUBLE NOT NULL, Z DOUBLE NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT PKEY_Smooth PRIMARY KEY (ID)

table-entry.name: Stacker
table-entry.col-data: ID INTEGER NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1), hPaddingSum INTEGER NOT NULL, vPaddingSum INTEGER NOT NULL, layers INTEGER NOT NULL, amount INTEGER NOT NULL, studHeight DOUBLE NOT NULL, horizontalHoleDistance DOUBLE NOT NULL, verticalHoleDistance DOUBLE NOT NULL, studDiameter DOUBLE NOT NULL, horizontalPadding DOUBLE NOT NULL, verticalPaddingBottom DOUBLE NOT NULL, orientation DOUBLE NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT PKEY_Stacker PRIMARY KEY (ID)

table-entry.name: WorkPiece
table-entry.col-data: ID INTEGER NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1), type INTEGER NOT NULL, shape INTEGER NOT NULL, material INTEGER NOT NULL, height DOUBLE NOT NULL, length DOUBLE NOT NULL, width DOUBLE NOT NULL, diameter DOUBLE NOT NULL, weight DOUBLE NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT PKEY_WorkPiece PRIMARY KEY (ID)

table-entry.name: UserFrame
table-entry.col-data: ID INTEGER NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1), NAME VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, number INTEGER NOT NULL, X DOUBLE NOT NULL, location INTEGER NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT UserFrame_location FOREIGN KEY (location)REFERENCES Coordinates(ID), CONSTRAINT PKEY_UserFrame PRIMARY KEY (ID)

table-entry.name: step
table-entry.col-data: ID INTEGER NOT NULL GENERATED BY DEFAULT AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1), gripper INTEGER NOT NULL, WorkPiece INTEGER NOT NULL, UserFrame INTEGER NOT NULL, Smooth INTEGER NOT NULL, RobotPutsetting INTEGER NOT NULL, offset INTEGER NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT PKEY_STEP PRIMARY KEY (ID), CONSTRAINT STEP_gripper FOREIGN KEY (gripper)REFERENCES gripper(ID), CONSTRAINT STEP_userFrame FOREIGN KEY (userFrame)REFERENCES userFrame(ID), CONSTRAINT STEP_Smooth FOREIGN KEY (Smooth)REFERENCES Smooth(ID), CONSTRAINT STEP_offset FOREIGN KEY (offset)REFERENCES Coordinates(ID), CONSTRAINT STEP_RobotPutsetting FOREIGN KEY (RobotPutsetting)REFERENCES RobotPutsetting(ID)
